questions.question: How do you prefer to travel?

options.text: By plane to far-off destinations
By car, enjoying the scenery along the way
By train for a scenic and leisurely journey
Staying local and exploring hidden gems

questions.question: What’s your favorite type of accommodation?

options.text: Luxury hotels with all the amenities
Cozy cabins or cottages in nature
Charming bed and breakfasts
Staying at home or in familiar places

questions.question: What activities excite you the most?

options.text: Extreme sports or adventurous outings
Exploring national parks and hiking
Cultural experiences and museums
Reading and relaxing in quiet places

questions.question: How do you like to plan your trips?

options.text: Spontaneously, I go where the wind takes me
With a detailed itinerary and stops planned out
Researching and learning about each destination
I prefer to stay in familiar places and relax
A quick weekend getaway
A week-long road trip
A couple of weeks exploring a new culture
A staycation to recharge and relax

questions.question: What’s your approach to food while traveling?

options.text: Trying exotic and local dishes
Stopping at diners and local eateries
Dining at well-reviewed restaurants
Eating at home or familiar places

questions.question: How do you feel about crowds?

options.text: I thrive in bustling tourist spots
I enjoy popular attractions but need some quiet time
I prefer less crowded and off-the-beaten-path locations
I avoid crowds and prefer solitude

questions.question: What kind of souvenirs do you like to bring back?

options.text: Unique and adventurous items from my travels
Local crafts and keepsakes from my journey
Artistic or cultural items that reflect the place
Nothing, I prefer to enjoy memories instead
I like flexibility and spontaneity
I prefer a mix of planned stops and spontaneity
I like to have a plan but leave room for changes
I enjoy having no plan at all
Adventurous and thrill-seeking
Relaxed and carefree on the road
Curious and explorative
Comfortable and cozy at home

result_logic.Adventurer: You seek thrill and excitement in every journey!
result_logic.Road Tripper: You love the freedom of the open road and discovering new places.
result_logic.Traveler: You thrive on cultural experiences and learning about the world.
result_logic.Homebody: You find joy in comfort and familiarity, preferring the cozy over the adventurous.
